nodes.text: Bishta was a human male, who, along with his partner Argin, planned to steal from the antiquities store of the collector Dok-Ondar. When Bishta heard of the destruction of Dok-Ondar's security droid BK-86, he contacted Argin, suggesting they carry out the job, but Argin informed him that the droid had been destroyed in a skirmish with Kase Finto, who similarly attempted to steal from Dok-Ondar.
